headline: CheddrSuite Launches Direct Sysco EDI Integration, Bringing Real-Time Pricing and Cost Control to Restaurants
summary: CheddrSuite, the restaurant management platform built by operators, for operators, today announced a direct integration with Sysco's Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) system. By pulling live Sysco pricing directly into CheddrSuite, restaurants save hours of manual updates and gain powerful use of the platform's tools—from accurate plate costing and inventory tracking to streamlined ordering and financial forecasting.

headline: REPEAT – Sysco To Go and Latin Restaurant Weeks Celebrate Houston’s Culinary Roots with Hispanic Heritage Night
summary: Event highlights Houston’s Latin culinary traditions while supporting local restaurants and food entrepreneursHOUSTON, Sept. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- On Monday, September 29, Sysco To Go and Latin Restaurant Weeks will host Hispanic Heritage Night, celebrating the flavors, traditions, and people behind Houston’s vibrant Latin food scene.
